title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 300 - Interest Rates for New York State and Local Employees' Retirement System and New York State and Local Police and Fire Retirement System
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 300 - Interest Rates for New York State and Local Employees' Retirement System and New York State and Local Police and Fire Retirement System

State Regulations
§ 300.1 - Regular interest; and rate of estimated future investment earnings
§ 300.2 - Rate of special interest
§ 300.3 - Interest on additional contributions made by member prior to june 13, 1939
§ 300.4 - Interest rate on loans to tier 1 and 2 members

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 300

Statutory authority: Retirement and Social Security Law, §§2, 11, 13,21, 302, 311, 519, 614

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
